personal.name: Alex Johnson
personal.bio: Passionate full-stack developer with 5+ years of experience creating innovative web applications. I specialize in React, Node.js, and modern web technologies. Always eager to tackle challenging problems and deliver exceptional user experiences.
personal.headline: Building the Future, One Line of Code at a Time
personal.subtitle: I create beautiful, functional, and user-centered digital experiences

projects.title: E-Commerce Platform
projects.description: Full-featured e-commerce platform with React, Node.js, and Stripe integration. Features include user authentication, product management, and order processing.

projects.title: Task Management App
projects.description: Collaborative task management application with real-time updates, team collaboration, and project tracking features.

projects.title: Weather Dashboard
projects.description: Beautiful weather dashboard with location-based forecasts, interactive maps, and detailed weather analytics.

projects.title: Social Media Analytics
projects.description: Comprehensive social media analytics platform with data visualization, engagement tracking, and performance insights.

testimonials.name: Sarah Chen
testimonials.feedback: Alex delivered exceptional work on our e-commerce platform. His attention to detail and technical expertise made the project a huge success.

testimonials.name: Michael Rodriguez
testimonials.feedback: Working with Alex was a game-changer for our startup. He built our entire platform from scratch and delivered beyond our expectations.

testimonials.name: Emily Zhang
testimonials.feedback: Alex's ability to translate our designs into pixel-perfect, interactive experiences is remarkable. Highly recommended!
